src:
Review Single
Gaya Elegan dan Seksi GOT7 dalam 'You Calling My Name'
05 Nov 2019, 12:46 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


GOT7 diduga berbicara soal hubungan dengan penggemar dalam lagu terbaru 'You Calling My Name'. (dok. JYP Entertainment)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- GOT7 kembali dengan lagu 'You Calling My Name' yang menjadi lagu utama dari mini album terbaru, 'Call My Name'. Lagu tersebut dirilis pada Senin (4/11) atau sekitar lima bulan sejak GOT7 merilis 'Eclipse'.You Calling My Name merupakan salah satu lagu yang menunjukkan kelembutan serta kedewasaan GOT7. Karya terbaru ini terdengar berbeda daripada lagu-lagu yang dirilis sebelumnya.You Calling My Name memiliki nuansa lebih lembut dan menenangkan dibandingkan lagu-lagu GOT7 lain. Tak hanya itu, chorus lagu ini juga memiliki beat yang adiktif meski tak se-enerjik Never Ever, apalagi Hard Carry.Gambaran elegan dan seksi terlihat pula dalam video musik You Calling My Name. Konsep seperti itu sudah pernah diberikan dalam video musik Eclipse. Kali ini, GOT7 menunjukkan visual menawan dari seluruh member. Seperti biasa, GOT7 selalu mengikutsertakan penggemar di dalam lagu, bahkan musik video melalui lambang-lambang tertentu. Biasanya, Ahgase (IGOT7), sebutan bagi penggemar, ditampilkan dalam bentuk burung.Namun kali ini, GOT7 menaruh banyak cahaya hijau neon yang menjadi warna identitas Ahgase dalam video You Calling My Name. Tak hanya itu, mereka juga diyakini bertutur tentang hubungan dengan penggemar dalam lirik."You are a part of me. You and me. We are one. You are the reason for my life. If you're not here, I'm not here," rap Mark.


Foto: Dok. JYP Entertainment

Video You Calling My Name juga memiliki pesan-pesan rahasia seperti huruf Korea (hangeul) "ㅂ" (b/p sound) dan "D" ("ㅂD"). Kombinasi huruf tersebut menggambarkan tulisan China "名," yang berarti nama, sesuai dengan judul lagu terbaru mereka.You Calling My Name ditulis oleh sang leader Im Jaebum (JB) bersama CEO JYP Entertainment, Park Jin-young yang kemudian dituntaskan oleh Louis Schoorl, Marco Borrero, Benjamin Ingrosso, dan pemenang Grammy Award David Brook.Sejak dirilis Senin (4/11) sore, You Calling My Name langsung menarik perhatian penggemar. Lagu tersebut berada di puncak tangga lagu iTunes 28 negara seperti Indonesia, Malaysia, Australia, Hong Kong, Meksiko, serta Inggris.




(chri/rea)
text:
Single Review
GOT7's Elegant and Sexy Style in 'You Calling My Name'
05 Nov 2019, 12:46 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


GOT7 allegedly talked about relationships with fans in the latest song 'You Calling My Name'. (doc. JYP Entertainment)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - GOT7 returned with the song 'You Calling My Name' which became the main song of the latest mini album, 'Call My Name'. The song was released on Monday (4/11) or about five months since GOT7 released 'Eclipse'. You Call My Name is one song that shows the softness and maturity of GOT7. This latest work sounds different than previously released songs. You Calling My Name has a softer and more soothing feel than other GOT7 songs. Not only that, the chorus of this song also has an addictive beat though it's not as energetic as Never Ever, especially Hard Carry. Elegant and sexy depictions are also seen in the music video You Calling My Name. Such a concept has already been given in the Eclipse music video. This time, GOT7 shows captivating visuals from all members. As usual, GOT7 always includes fans in songs, even music videos through certain symbols. Typically, Ahgase (IGOT7), as fans call it, is displayed in the form of a bird. But this time, GOT7 put a lot of neon green light that became the color of Ahgase's identity in the video You Calling My Name. Not only that, they are also believed to speak about the relationship with fans in the lyrics. "You are a part of me. You and me. We are one. You are the reason for my life. If you're not here, I'm not here, "rap Mark.


Photo: Doc. JYP Entertainment

The video You Calling My Name also has secret messages such as Korean letters (hangeul) "ㅂ" (b / p sound) and "D" ("ㅂ D"). The combination of letters illustrates the Chinese writing "名," which means the name, in accordance with the title of their latest song. You Calling My Name was written by leader Im Jaebum (JB) with JYP Entertainment CEO, Park Jin-young, which was later completed by Louis Schoorl, Marco Borrero, Benjamin Ingrosso, and Grammy Award winner David Brook. Since it was released Monday (4/11) afternoon, You Calling My Name immediately attracted the attention of fans. The song was at the top of the iTunes charts in 28 countries such as Indonesia, Malaysia, Australia, Hong Kong, Mexico and the United Kingdom.




(chri / rea)
